step.message: Yea Nice swordsmanship, if my fathers anecdotes had any truth to them, it must be the parts about your father. You are a true reincarnation of him
So I’ve heard. You’re not too shabby of a mage yourself. At this rate you’ll become the archmage- eh?
Well, one can hope. What of my father anyway? Does he know I’m safe now?
Yes, once I left town I sent a message to him saying that I’ve got you, and we are on the way to finding my father
I am my father, aren’t I? sly smile
